lines: jaisejaise veena kee chhuttiyaan khatm hone ko aa rahee theen dev kee pareshaanee badhatee ja rahee thee
veena kee badalee kee baat abhee adhar mein latakee huee thee
aise mein veena ke paas deharaadoon jaane ke atirikt koee aur raasta nahin tha
haan chhuttiyaan badhava sakatee thee bina vetan ke
dev ka man kisee agyaat shanka se bechain tha
veena deharaadoon jaegee
baaton hee baaton mein baat nikal jaegee
vah apane maataapita sab se kah baithee to na jaane kya hoga usase door rahegee to kaheen usake prati usaka moh kam na ho jae
aisa kuchh veena ke man mein nahin tha
na hee vah man ke kisee kone mein kisee dar ko ab baitha dekh rahee thee
chaar maheene beetane ko aa gae the
dev bhalaachanga tha aur ab usakee beemaaree kee baat to usake manomastishk se mit gaee thee
subah kee usakee pareshaanee use apanee dinacharya ka ek ang lagane lagee thee
lekin jisake man mein chor hota hai pareshaan vah bevajah hota rahata hai
dev pareshaan tha aur yahee soch raha tha ki kaise roke veena ko apane se door jaakar rahane ko
seedhe kahata to vah naukaree to chhodatee nahin
sarakaaree naukaree aasaanee se to nahin milatee
aise mein bhoomika baandhane kee koshish karata rahata
baatabaat mein ghumaaphira kar veena ko apanee bhaavanaon kee dhaara mein baha kar le jaata
veena mera janm sudhar gaya
tumhaare aane ke baad lagata hai main kabhee akela nahin tha
beete din ab bure svapn kee bhaanti lagate hain
kuchh yaad nahin karana chaahata
veena muskura detee
usakee bhaavanaon kee kadr karatee thee
dev ka saath paakar vah bhee khush thee
jab bhee usake saath kolej jaatee aur dekhatee dev ke prati sabhee ke man mein base saadar bhaav ko
usake saathiyon mein dev ke dabadabe ko
sabhee chhaatron me dev ke prati aadar ko
man khil uthata usaka
skool mein vah to praathimik star kee shikshika thee
yahaan to sab kolej mein eme beee ke vyask chhaatr the
chhaatr aise kee jaraasee chingaaree ko hava dekar aag bana dene vaale
vahee chhaatr jo prinsipal ke saamane to naare lagaate aur dev ko saamane paakar ek dam chupp ho jaate
kya tha aisa aakarshan kaisa tha aisa tez dev ke chehare par ki sab usase baat karake saumy ho jaate the

yahee kahate suna tha usane sabhee se ki sab kuchh theek raha to dev samay se pahale prophesar ban jaega aur phir ek din dillee vishvavidyaalay ka vaisachaansalar kitana garv tha usake sabhee saathiyon ko aise vyakti kee patnee banana usake bhaagy kee sabase badee upalabdhi thee
aisee bhaavanaon kee tarango mein bahatee veena ko aakhir ek din dev ne kah diya  veena hamen kisee baat kee kamee nahin hai
tumhaaree badalee kee main koshish to kar hee raha hoon
aise mein tum mujhase door jaakar raho isakee main aavashyakata nahin samajhata
achchha rahega ki ham donon saath rahen
koshish karate rahen aur aise mein tab tak tum binaavetan ke chhuttee lie raho
isase skool ke adhikaariyon par dabaav bhee bana rahega
aur jaldee se tumhaaree badalee ho jaegee

choonki veena dev ko apane se ya apane har kisee shubhachintak se adhik samajhadaar maanane lagee thee usane dev kee is raay ko saharsh sveekaar kar liya aur isee aashay kee chitthee apane skool mein daal dee
udhar deharaadoon mein jab maan nirmala ko is baat ka pata laga to unhonne ek hee shabd mein baat samaapt kar dee  hamaaree betee shaadee ke baad khush hai
jaisa vah chaahatee hai ya jaisa usaka pati chaahata hai vahee achchha hai
ab hamen apanee raay nahin denee
vah chhuttee le ya naukaree kare ab yah usaka nijee maamala hai
lekin usakee bahan suneeta ko is baat ka jab pata laga to usane apanee naaraazagee spasht likh dee thee  mujhe mammee se pata laga tumhaaree lambee chhuttee ke aavedan ka
yah tumane theek nahin kiya
sarakaaree naukaree koee raaste par padee nahin milatee
jab tak badalee nahin hotee tumhen deharaadoon jaakar rahana chaahie aur niyamit roop se skool jaana chaahie
mujhe dekho shaadee ke baad saal mein sirph doteen maheene hee apane pati ke paas rah paatee hoon
himaachal ke ek kone mein mera skool hai aur doosare kone mein unaka hotal
lekin naukaree kee vajah se ham donon ne paristhitiyon se samajhauta kar rakha hai
tumhaara pati bhee to naukaree hee karata hai
aise mein tumhen sadaiv apane va apane parivaar ke bhavishy kee suraksha ke lie naukaree par niyamit roop se jaana chaahie
veena ko baat to suneeta kee bhee uchit lagee
lekin patr padhakar dev kee pratikriya dekhakar usane apanee raay nahin badalee
dev ne patr padhate hee kaha tha  theek hai suneeta deedee tumase badee hain
lekin apanee paristhitiyon kee tulana vah hamase nahin kar sakateen aur doosare hamaare nijee maamale mein koee is tarah dakhalandaajee kare yah mujhe achchha nahin lagata
aise mein veena ne do shabdon ka patr suneeta ko bhej diya  deedee aapakee raay par main amal nahin kar sakatee meree paristhitiyaan aapase alag hain
mere pati kee mujh par naukaree karane kee bandish nahin hai
aur abhee vakt hee kitana hua hai ve meree badalee karavaane ke lie pooree koshish kar rahe hain
badalee ho jaegee tab main apane ghar ke saathasaath apanee naukaree ke prati nyaay kar sakoongee
aur jab tak badalee nahin hotee main apana ghar apane pati ke nikat hee rahana chaahatee hoon
veena ne itaneesee baat likhakar suneeta ko yah ehasaas karava diya tha ki usakee nizee jindagee mein suneeta kee raay koee maayane nahin rakhatee
vah apanee jindagee svayan jeena chaahatee hai
use apane vivaahitajeevan mein kisee teesare ko dakhalandaajee uchit nahin lagatee
isake baad suneeta kee koee chitthee veena ko nahin aaee
